EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Mmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Excellent.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I've grown tired of
awaiting your arrival.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]So,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you wish to become my apprentice?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Say no more.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am able to see all![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]For I am...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]what you might call the[System:Color name="Emphasis" ] Great
Master of the art of Dandori[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/]I will present you with [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Ten Stories[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] With
each success,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you may [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]ascend to the next
story [System:Color name="Default"]in your climb to Dandori greatness.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It's been a while since I've tested a
newcomer...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps a special [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]reward[System:Color name="Default"]
is in order as well.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9c52f39cd1fc4d629a5262d48296240e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Now...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]let us begin your training!
EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="8a9e76a763e74bce9db635735f40a936" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Mmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Back again?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Good. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Only through
rigorous training can you explore the
hidden depths of your Dandori powers!
EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="3abbd4ea76c644c38e407a9b970ab0cd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I've been waiting for you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] This must be a
sign that you wish to be a Dandori master!
EXCave.EXCave_EnterFloor_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="5957e7ec3cce47ee9c4db2409bdee195" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I have put great pains into creating this
course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Make as many attempts as you
deem necessary!
EXCave.EXCave_Lose_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="728796e5da4445b1a0e985982538c8c9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]It seems you still have much to learn.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
The path to Dandori mastery cannot be
traversed in a single day.
EXCave.EXCave_Lose_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="47099fbd866943378088d21d24554273" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]I'm very disappointed in you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Your Dandori
abilities are far from impressive.
EXCave.EXCave_Lose_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="867886a3c3d64bf2b1ddcac5c5d83a09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Do not fret![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Failure can be used as strong
motivation.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] There's only one thing you can
do...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Keep trying!
EXCave.EXCave_Win_General_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="2d6b73f1cc45466bb6d164f2c7a81130" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Mmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've passed![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I will be waiting for
you at the next trial.
EXCave.EXCave_Win_General_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c9ca5f93df044fdfb94733716baee913" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You've shown some Dandori expertise![etc:Wait frame="15"/] But
I wonder...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] How will you fare next time?
EXCave.EXCave_Win_General_02_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="590f983f87ab4c2db82c074c9baa2eb3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Was that too easy for you?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Things are about to get less easy.
EXCave.EXCave_Win_GetWhiteOnyon_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="91539b6d25294987872f4bf257aeca7c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Splendid![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now I shall grant you a true
jewel...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]White Onion[System:Color name="Default"].[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="91539b6d25294987872f4bf257aeca7c" Scale="1"/]I'm surprised that you've been able to keep
up with my training so far...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You display
amazing promise.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="91539b6d25294987872f4bf257aeca7c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]But your training's far from over![etc:Wait frame="15"/] If I were
you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd be careful from here on out...
EXCave.EXCave_Win_GetWhiteOnyon_99_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="c2f4a45e5f7c4ca582995051b7718d81" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]An enchanting display of skill.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You've
made me proud, apprentice!
EXCave.EXCave_Win_GetPurpleOnyon_99_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="aacfa51526bf4a42bdfef0d578e832f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]You've exhibited masterful Dandori skills![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I never grow tired of seeing you in action.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But you must remember to keep improving!
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_00_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="25a6397bd3084867a9b147667e7a82e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Mmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let us take a moment.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is
plenty of training for now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="25a6397bd3084867a9b147667e7a82e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Come back when
you wish to train again.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_01_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="540365f956174bcb94a124caf7c04772" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]What's that?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You're leaving?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't forget
to take this jewel—the White Onion—with
you as your reward.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="540365f956174bcb94a124caf7c04772" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Remember—you can
return to your training whenever you wish.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_03_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="61ef4cef47a14e10851042a43b469cb6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Dazzling work![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe there is nothing
left for me to teach you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="61ef4cef47a14e10851042a43b469cb6" Scale="1"/]And so I grant you this jewel—the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Purple
Onion[System:Color name="Default"].[etc:Wait frame="15"/] From this point on,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you must walk
your own Dandori path.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_03_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f0e6c53b22fa48ef9e33470b122d5ca3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Nicely done![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now you can easily increase
your Purple Pikmin population.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f0e6c53b22fa48ef9e33470b122d5ca3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So, um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been wondering about that
leafling, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f0e6c53b22fa48ef9e33470b122d5ca3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Do you think we should try to bring them
back to the surface and cure them of
their leafiness?
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_03_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="e8d11b531e9245bea3ba2f70b919ada8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Out of the question![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You won't be
administering a cure of any kind![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I have no intention of leaving this place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e8d11b531e9245bea3ba2f70b919ada8" Scale="1"/]I may not remember who I was or where
I'm from anymore...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But it's no matter now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="e8d11b531e9245bea3ba2f70b919ada8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm content with my way of life.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It brings
me joy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just leave me in peace.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_03_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="7cdb00df2a114a45b7b5f49016ac8dfd" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This one seems...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]different from the other
leaflings...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If they want to stay here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then
we have to respect their wishes.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_03_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="ee57fd3e586c4fa1ba21a41d7a227b26" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Understood, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Time to
head back, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_03_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="244d9891f5af4f45906da8c6065064de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Wait a moment![etc:Wait frame="8"/] You don't want to forget
your reward,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] this jewel—the Purple Onion.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Take it with you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="244d9891f5af4f45906da8c6065064de" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm happy to train
with you anytime.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_05_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="075fdb4656804bb0a76a061c3fb0a9c2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Dazzling work![etc:Wait frame="15"/] I believe there is nothing
left for me to teach you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="075fdb4656804bb0a76a061c3fb0a9c2" Scale="1"/]Use these jewels—the [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Purple Onion[System:Color name="Default"] and
[System:Color name="Emphasis" ]White Onion[System:Color name="Default"]—I bestowed upon you...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now
you must walk your own Dandori path.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_05_P01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="f79b72add92d43e29254275593f3b5f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Nicely done![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Now you can easily increase
both your Purple Pikmin and your White
Pikmin populations.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f79b72add92d43e29254275593f3b5f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]So, um,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been wondering about that
leafling, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f79b72add92d43e29254275593f3b5f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion chara="GNpcLeaf_00" name="Wait" lipsync="0"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Do you think we should try to bring them
back to the surface and cure them of
their leafiness?
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_05_P02:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="45f7f101ddc44d14a70aae09a69f19ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Angry"/]Out of the question![etc:Wait frame="15"/] You won't be
administering a cure of any kind![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I have no intention of leaving this place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45f7f101ddc44d14a70aae09a69f19ae" Scale="1"/]I may not remember who I was or where
I'm from anymore...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But it's no matter now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="45f7f101ddc44d14a70aae09a69f19ae" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm content with my way of life.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It brings
me joy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just leave me in peace.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_05_P03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="f07f957e6ee04e92a4edccca4f58698d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This one seems...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]different from the other
leaflings...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If they want to stay here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then
we have to respect their wishes.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_05_P04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5f4855434620432d9c3f4a9daa257c2e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Understood, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Time to
head back, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_05_P05:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="0488066af67b42328a69c9268196cffa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You would go without collecting
your rewards?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0488066af67b42328a69c9268196cffa" Scale="1"/]These jewels—the White Onion and the
Purple Onion.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please take them with you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0488066af67b42328a69c9268196cffa" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I hope to see you
again soon for more training.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_080_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c0ad5343fc7a4f46b2836b667a49ac02" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You've shown me some fine Dandori skills.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
But you must keep training diligently.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="c0ad5343fc7a4f46b2836b667a49ac02" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Come back for more
training whenever you have a chance.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_084_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="63cfee744c5d4ad89cb17d1610bdadc4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad02"/]Your desire to master all things Dandori
is clear![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Hats off to you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my apprentice![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="63cfee744c5d4ad89cb17d1610bdadc4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] You can come back
for more training whenever you wish.
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_081_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="99ef91b214ff4493abb1c7408c18fbe7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Records are seemingly made to be broken![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Mmm,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] splendid indeed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="99ef91b214ff4493abb1c7408c18fbe7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]I'll be here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] as always.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Return for more
training whenever you see fit!
EXCave.EXCave_ResultTalk_082_P00:
[Npc:Icon chara="LeafHermit"/][UE:Meta key="c430ad943c0f429ca6d5406027ed093f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Mmm...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] let us take a moment.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] That is

you wish to train again.

administering a cure of any kind![etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I have no intention of leaving this place.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f66cfb1f461d434ebcd956ecdcce34b5" Scale="1"/]I may not remember who I was or where
I'm from anymore...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] But it's no matter now.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="f66cfb1f461d434ebcd956ecdcce34b5" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'm content with my way of life.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] It brings
me joy.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Please,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] just leave me in peace.
EXCave.ExCave_Refer_Clear1st_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="f091536d243b4019a04bd6a4f95f3a99" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]This one seems...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]different from the other
leaflings...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] If they want to stay here,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then
we have to respect their wishes.
EXCave.ExCave_Refer_Clear1st_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][Npc:AutoLookAtSpeaker enable="0"/][UE:Meta key="dced0504cb1d4bd0b8b2db59617b93f2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Understood, Captain.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Well then.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Time to
head back, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]!
